code: import React from'react';import{ArrowTrendingUpIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TrendingTopics=_ref=>{let{onTopicClick,topics=[{name:"AI Ethics",count:1234},{name:"Quantum Computing",count:987},{name:"Climate Tech",count:756},{name:"Web3",count:654},{name:"Cybersecurity",count:543}]}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowTrendingUpIcon,{className:"h-5 w-5 text-red-500 mr-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-white",children:"Trending Topics"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-2",children:topics.map((topic,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>onTopicClick(topic.name),className:"w-full flex items-center justify-between p-3 text-left hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700 rounded-lg transition-colors",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 font-medium",children:topic.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400",children:[topic.count.toLocaleString()," searches"]})]},index))})]});};export default TrendingTopics;
